content.rendered:
Directed by Shashank Khaitan

Written by Nagraj Manjule

Cast Janhvi Kapoor (Parthavi). Ishaan Khattar (Madhukar). Ashutosh Rana (Ratan Singh). Aditya Kumar (Devilal). Kharaj Mukherjee (Sachin Bhowmick). Ankit Bisht (Gokul). Shalini Kapoor (Parthavi’s Mother). Aishwarya Narkar (Madhukar’s Mother). Usha Shree (Bheema’s Mother). Sartaj Ansari (Help at Ratan Singh’s Havelli). Hempushpak Arora (Principal). Aishwarya Avinash (Gayatri). Vishwanath Chatterjee (Inspector Shekawat). Alok Ranjan Chaudhary (Manager). Shubhaavi Choksey (Promila Bhowmick (as Shubhavi Harshal Choksey)). Janhavi Dave (Anuradha). Ayansh Devaliya (Toddler Aaditya). Ishika Gagneja (Ambika). Balaji Gauri (Sulekha Goenka). Harish (News Reporter). Mhommadhasan Salim Khan (Baby Aaditya). Kulsen (Roll Call Teacher). Durgesh Kumar (Bheema). Godaan Kumar (Roop Singh). Laxman Kumar (Shopkeeper). Mukesh Nagar (Bharatlal). Govind Pandey (Madhukar’s Father). Ganesh Pardeshi (Doctor At Clinic). Ambuj Sinha (Vishwajith). Sanyukta Sinha (Dance Teacher). Pradeep Solanki (Mr. Agnihotri). Maneesh Verma (Arvind Mama (as Manish Verma)). Shridhar Watsar (Purshottam). Ganesh Kumar (Match commentator). Ansh Pandit (Pritam). Satkeer (Satish). Harsh Shashwat (Digital Partner)

Language Hindi

Producers Anurag Bedi. Sumit Chawla. Hiroo Johar. Karan Johar. Sujay Kutty. Apoorva Mehta. Ajay Sharma. Somesh Shivraj

Production Dharma Production. Zee Studio
